CustomField.formula: OW_status_due_date__c + CASE( MOD( OW_status_due_date__c - DATE(1900, 1, 1), 7), 0, -OW_warning_offset__c + FLOOR((-OW_warning_offset__c - 4 ) / 5) * 2, 1, -OW_warning_offset__c + FLOOR((-OW_warning_offset__c - 3) / 5 ) * 2, 2, -OW_warning_offset__c + FLOOR((-OW_warning_offset__c - 2)/ 5 ) * 2, 3, -OW_warning_offset__c + FLOOR((-OW_warning_offset__c - 1 )/ 5 ) * 2, 4, -OW_warning_offset__c + FLOOR(-OW_warning_offset__c / 5) * 2, 5, -OW_warning_offset__c + FLOOR(-OW_warning_offset__c / 5) * 2 - 1, 6, -OW_warning_offset__c + FLOOR(-OW_warning_offset__c / 5) * 2 - 2, null)
CustomField.label: Amber date (formula)
